mapper.select: select * from customer A inner join Zip B on A.ZipCode = B.ZipCode where cstId = #{cstId}
select ITEM.*, ORDERS.*, to_char(ORDERS.ORDERDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMI')||ORDERS.SAMETIMECOUNT||ITEM.ITEMID orderNumber from Orders inner join Item on ORDERS.itemid = ITEM.itemid

select ITEM.*, ORDERS.*, to_char(ORDERS.ORDERDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMI')||ORDERS.SAMETIMECOUNT||ITEM.ITEMID orderNumber from Orders inner join Item on ORDERS.ITEMID = ITEM.ITEMID where TRUNC(ORDERS.ORDERDATE)=to_date(#{orderDate}, 'YYYYMMDD')

select ITEM.*, ORDERS.*, to_char(ORDERS.ORDERDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMI')||ORDERS.SAMETIMECOUNT||ITEM.ITEMID orderNumber from Orders inner join Item on ORDERS.ITEMID = ITEM.ITEMID where TRUNC(ORDERS.ORDERDATE)=to_date(#{orderDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') and ORDERS.SAMETIMECOUNT=#{sameTimeCount} and ITEM.ITEMID=#{itemId}

select ITEM.*, ORDERS.*, to_char(ORDERS.ORDERDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMI')||ORDERS.SAMETIMECOUNT||ITEM.ITEMID orderNumber from Orders inner join Item on ORDERS.itemid = ITEM.itemid where ITEM.ITEMNAME=#{itemName}

select CUSTOMER.*, ORDERS.*, to_char(ORDERS.ORDERDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMI')||ORDERS.SAMETIMECOUNT||ITEM.ITEMID orderNumber from Orders inner join Item on ORDERS.ITEMID = ITEM.ITEMID inner join Customer on ORDERS.CSTCODE = CUSTOMER.CSTCODE

select CUSTOMER.*, ORDERS.*, to_char(ORDERS.ORDERDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMI')||ORDERS.SAMETIMECOUNT||ITEM.ITEMID orderNumber from Orders inner join Item on ORDERS.ITEMID = ITEM.ITEMID inner join Customer on ORDERS.CSTCODE = CUSTOMER.CSTCODE where upper(LEVELCODE) LIKE '%'||upper(#{levelCode})||'%'

select CUSTOMER.*, ORDERS.*, to_char(ORDERS.ORDERDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMI')||ORDERS.SAMETIMECOUNT||ITEM.ITEMID orderNumber from Orders inner join Item on ORDERS.ITEMID = ITEM.ITEMID inner join Customer on ORDERS.CSTCODE = CUSTOMER.CSTCODE where TRUNC(ORDERS.ORDERDATE)=to_date(#{orderDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') and ORDERS.SAMETIMECOUNT=#{sameTimeCount} and ITEM.ITEMID=#{itemId}

select CUSTOMER.*, ORDERS.*, to_char(ORDERS.ORDERDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMI')||ORDERS.SAMETIMECOUNT||ITEM.ITEMID orderNumber from Orders inner join Item on ORDERS.ITEMID = ITEM.ITEMID inner join Customer on ORDERS.CSTCODE = CUSTOMER.CSTCODE where upper(CSTID) LIKE '%'||upper(#{cstId})||'%'

select * from Orders A inner join OptionPrice B on A.OptionCode = B.OptionCode inner join Item C on A.ItemId = C.ItemId inner join PayKind D on A.PayCode = D.PayCode inner join Delivery E on A.DlvChargeCode = E.DlvChargeCode inner join Zip F on A.ZipCode = F.ZipCode
